title: 问一下-
author: 神哥
txt_content: 人气    钻石  哪个好？

replies.author: ever-lose
replies.txt_content: 你只要知道它本身的用处就行

replies.author: HGK
replies.txt_content:
人气←_←
1人气=3积分
1钻石=2积分
头像差评(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━┻
